definition: having the colour of blue and red mixed together
writing or a piece of writing that is too grand in style
a disease, especially of children, that causes a high temperature and small red spots that cover the whole body
an animal, a bird or a person that scavenges
a young swan (= a large white bird with a long neck that lives on or near water)
the quality of being holy
a title of respect used when talking to or about the Pope and some other religious leaders
the state of being very important and worth protecting
the state of being holy
the quality of being like a saint or of being very holy and good
a small black and white North American animal that can produce a strong unpleasant smell to defend itself when it is attacked
skunkweed (= a strong type of cannabis)
very drunk
the total of the numbers in a piece of digital data, used to check that the data is correct
a collection of items, especially pieces of music or writing, taken from different places and put together
the process of compiling something
a small round area that has a different colour or feels different from the surface it is on
a small mark or lump on a person’s skin, sometimes with a yellow head to it
a small dirty mark on something
a particular area or place
a small feature or part of somebody/something with a particular quality
a small amount of something
a small amount of a liquid
a part of a television, radio, club or theatre show that is given to a particular person or type of entertainment
a position in a competition, event or team
a spotlight (= a light with a single, very bright beam that can be directed at a particular place or person, especially a performer on the stage)
a good or pleasant part of something that is unpleasant or bad in all other ways
not able to move, for example because you are frightened or surprised
to like somebody/something
if something hits the spot it does exactly what it should do
in a difficult situation
to be very much better than somebody/something
people cannot change their character, especially if they have a bad character
immediately
at the actual place where something is happening
in one exact place, without moving in any direction
to make somebody feel uncomfortable or embarrassed by asking them a difficult question
to stop a fire from burning by pouring water over it; to put out a light
to pour a lot of liquid over somebody/something; to soak somebody/something in liquid
a water plant with small round green leaves and thin stems. It has a strong taste and is often eaten raw in salads.
the hard red-brown wood of a tropical tree, that has a pleasant smell and is used for making expensive furniture
